com.bigdata.ha

Class PrepareRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.ha.PrepareRequest

  • public class PrepareRequest
extends Object
    A 2-phase request as coordinated by the leader (local object).
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrepareRequest

        public PrepareRequest(IHANotifyReleaseTimeResponse consensusReleaseTime,
              IJoinedAndNonJoinedServices gatherJoinedAndNonJoinedServices,
              IJoinedAndNonJoinedServices prepareJoinedAndNonJoinedServices,
              IRootBlockView rootBlock,
              long timeout,
              TimeUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        consensusReleaseTime - The consensus release time from the GATHER.
        gatherJoinedAndNonJoinedServices - The services joined and non-joined with the met quorum as of the atomic decision point for the GATHER.
        prepareJoinedAndNonJoinedServices - The services joined and non-joined with the met quorum as of the atomic decision point for the PREPARE.
        isRootBlock0 - if this is rootBlock0.
        rootBlock - The new root block.
        timeout - How long to wait for the other services to prepare.
        unit - The unit for the timeout.
